alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:38PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Jackson County through 815 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lee`s Summit, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Raytown, Grandview, Grain Valley, Greenwood, Lake Lotawana, Lake Tapawingo and Unity Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 470 between mile markers 2 and 15. Interstate 435 between mile markers 65 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
